name: Planet Sweeper
description:
This small web game was originally made as a final project for a 2nd year class in Uni.

I started with a classic minesweeper and then gave it my own spin, making what is kind of a "reverse minesweeper", where the goal is too click on all crystals, using the least amount of "empty" clicks on the board.

The Leaderboard uses LocalStorage to save your scores, there's no multiplayer involved in it.

Assets that I used to make it:

Interactive sound effects by Tomas Pettersson using their sfxr tool under the MIT free software license.

BGM by Monster Logix Studio, made available with the CC0 license

The original minesweeper board algorithm is by cosmith
